message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to meet your needs perfectly and comes with all the features you're looking for. Given its value and quality, I propose a price of $120 for it. I believe this offer reflects its worth while also allowing us to reach a fair agreement. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or if you have any questions.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90 for the product. I'm really interested in it, but I have a budget constraint and I'd like to see if we can meet in the middle.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I would like to accommodate you as much as possible. I am willing to negotiate the price down to $105. This still allows us to cover our costs and provides a reasonable profit for us. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations. Let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this arrangement.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $105. Would you be willing to meet me at $95? I think that's a fair price for both of us, and I'd be happy to make a purchase at that price.
